attributes.review: If I could rate this app less than 1 star I would. I read the reviews and thought to myself, well this app couldn’t be as bad as these reviews said, but I got the AP and it was horrible.
attributes.title: -5 Stars

attributes.review: Love this app! Easy way to allow Big T to preserve his 1st amendment.
attributes.title: Great American App

attributes.review: The format of this horrendous app has caused me anguish and the thought of the seeing the font makes me gag. It’s sooo glitchy and ugly I can’t even comprehend the willingness to allow this app to be brought forth on the App Store. I rest my case!
attributes.title: I’m disgusted 🤮

attributes.review: Whoever designed the app needs to lose their job. In high school I designed a better and more organized app. The flow of the tools is horrendous. If our president approved this trash, then what else should we expect.👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: As soon I got this I got a virus on my phone the Cheeto virus !! It was so bad turned my whole apps ORANGE it was a terrible experience not fixable at all had to buy a whole new phone would not recommend .
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: This app is trash🤢 please take it out.😡 i hate this app because it gave me MAJOR PROBLEMS like why does it spam me and now I can’t get it to stop I would provide pictures but there isn’t an option for it.
attributes.title: HATE IT

attributes.review: I downloaded the app in order to see the current news on the Orange Cheeto guy but it turns out I forgot to turn off my toaster and then my sister walked my socks only to find my brother had eaten all the cars
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: i was going to vote for trump this year, but i then realized how bad his app was and the type of person he is. please remove this app from the app store. no one deserves to go through the experience of using it. ONE STAR.
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: I thought we were trying it make America great again?? As a trump supporter I am truly disappointed in this app. The only way I was able to use the app was by allowing them to invade my privacy. UNACCEPTABLE!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this as a way to keep up to date on all things happening in America but it’s just news about a sitting president violating human rights & leading an immoral life! Would give 0 stars if I could.
attributes.title: Supporter & frustrated
